text: Systems Engineer Systems Engineer Systems Engineer - Integration LLC Houston, AL Work Experience Systems Engineer Integration LLC - Decatur, AL April 2018 to Present Work with and maintain IT solutions for approximately 30 contract clients, with several hourly clients on an as needed basis.

* Work with government contractors to help implement a DFARS compliant network.
